shadow.$description: Primary shadow color for elevation effects

surface.$description: Primary surface color for backgrounds and containers

muted.$description: Secondary surface for sidebars, alternating rows, and nested elements

subtle.$description: Tertiary surface for hover states, wells, and recessed areas

inverted.$description: Inverted surface for dark backgrounds in light mode

muted.$description: Secondary inverted surface for nested elements within inverted containers

foreground.$description: Primary text and icon color for headings and body text

muted.$description: Secondary text for descriptions, placeholders, and less prominent content

inverted.$description: Text color on dark backgrounds like primary buttons

muted.$description: Secondary text color on dark backgrounds

border.$description: Primary border color for inputs, cards, and containers

muted.$description: Subtle border for dividers, separators, and less prominent boundaries
Subtle border for dividers within inverted containers

ring.$description: Focus ring color for accessibility outlines and focus states

hover.$description: Background color for hover states on neutral interactive elements

active.$description: Background color for active or selected states

pressed.$description: Background color for pressed or clicking states

primary.$description: Primary button and CTA background color

foreground.$description: Text and icon color on primary buttons

border.$description: Border color for primary buttons and outlined primary elements

secondary.$description: Secondary button and accent background color

foreground.$description: Text and icon color on secondary buttons

border.$description: Border color for secondary buttons and outlined secondary elements

foreground.$description: Text and icon color on destructive buttons

border.$description: Border color for destructive buttons and outlined destructive elements

info.$description: Info status color for informational messages, tips, and non-critical alerts

muted.$description: Info status muted background for subtle info indicators

foreground.$description: Info status text color for readability on info backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Info status emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Info status border color for info containers and alerts

success.$description: Success status color for positive outcomes, completed actions, and confirmations

muted.$description: Success status muted background for subtle success indicators

foreground.$description: Success status text color for readability on success backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Success status emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Success status border color for success containers and alerts

warning.$description: Warning status color for cautions, pending states, and attention required

muted.$description: Warning status muted background for subtle warning indicators

foreground.$description: Warning status text color for readability on warning backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Warning status emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Warning status border color for warning containers and alerts

error.$description: Error status color for failures, critical issues, and destructive actions

muted.$description: Error status muted background for subtle error indicators

foreground.$description: Error status text color for readability on error backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Error status emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Error status border color for error containers and alerts

disabled.$description: Disabled background color for inactive interactive elements

foreground.$description: Disabled text and icon color for inactive elements

tooltip.$description: Tooltip background color for contextual help and hints

foreground.$description: Tooltip text color for readability on dark tooltip backgrounds

1.$description: Accent 1 base color for categorical data and visual distinction

muted.$description: Accent 1 muted background for subtle indicators

foreground.$description: Accent 1 text color for readability on accent backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Accent 1 emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Accent 1 border color for containers and elements

muted.$description: Accent 2 muted background for subtle indicators

foreground.$description: Accent 2 text color for readability on accent backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Accent 2 emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Accent 2 border color for containers and elements

muted.$description: Accent 3 muted background for subtle indicators

foreground.$description: Accent 3 text color for readability on accent backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Accent 3 emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Accent 3 border color for containers and elements

muted.$description: Accent 4 muted background for subtle indicators

foreground.$description: Accent 4 text color for readability on accent backgrounds

emphasis.$description: Accent 4 emphasis color for icons and strong indicators

border.$description: Accent 4 border color for containers and elements
